name: Chaos Pidgeon
description:
Humans and pidgeons are natural enemies. They move around in their cars, eating their fancy hot dogs and not sharing anything with their flying neighbours.

However, pidgeons have a secret weapon, and one of them has refined it to maximize efficiency: yes, this is a game about bird poop.

Fly around the city and cause chaos with your cloaca, who knows what unforseen consequences you might see?
